sentences.en: Candy: Four hundred. Maybe I shouldn't apply to a prestigious school?
sentences.cn: 凯蒂: 四百分.也许我不应该申请名校是 吧 ?

sentences.en: Details of the prestigious annual BAFTA film awards, including nominees and winners.
sentences.cn: 每年最负盛名的英国电影和电视艺术学院奖的相关信息, 包括提名者和获奖者.

sentences.en: Hollywood legend Clint Eastwood a commander in France's prestigious Legion of Honour.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞传奇人物克林·伊斯威特加冕法国声名显赫的荣誉勋章.

sentences.en: I was delighted to be a nominee and to receive such a prestigious award in recognition of our company's achievements.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴获得提名，也很荣幸接受如此声誉卓越的奖项，这是对我们公司所取得成就的认可。

sentences.en: If you expect to enter this prestigious university, you should apply now.
sentences.cn: 如果期望进入这所著名学府, 你现在就应该申请了.

sentences.en: If you'd married Miss Su, wouldn't that prestigious post be yours? "
sentences.cn: 你娶了苏小姐, 这体面差使不就是你的? ”

sentences.en: In particular, some prestigious universities vision is " a corresponding rise. "
sentences.cn: 特别是一些名牌大学眼界正 “ 水涨船高 ”.

sentences.en: It is one of the British sporting calendar's most prestigious events.
sentences.cn: 这是英国体坛大事表上最负盛名的赛事之一。

sentences.en: It's one of the best equipped and most prestigious schools in the country.
sentences.cn: 这是国内设备最先进、最有威望的学校之一。

sentences.en: National champion teams advance to the prestigious SIFE World Cup.
sentences.cn: 全国冠军队伍将会晋升参与享负盛名的赛扶世界杯赛事.

sentences.en: Prestigious names like Princeton, Harvard, Stanford, and Yale usually top the list.
sentences.cn: 声名在外的学校比如普林斯顿大学 、 哈佛大学 、 斯坦福大学 、 耶鲁大学都名列前茅.

sentences.en: The company won a prestigious contract for work on Europe's tallest building.
sentences.cn: 这家公司赢得了一份极为重要的合同，参与建设欧洲最高的大厦。

sentences.en: The first floor has a prestigious lobby and a car park entrance.
sentences.cn: 这大厦设计是地面首层为大堂及停车场入口.

sentences.en: The young man graduated from a prestigious university.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻人毕业于一所名牌大学.

sentences.en: Without your assistance, I would not have graduated from this prestigious university.
sentences.cn: 要不是因为你的帮忙, 我也许不能从这所名大学毕业.

trans.tran_cn: 受尊敬的，有声望的，<古>魔术的，欺骗的
trans.tran_en: admired as one of the best and most important
